Emperor Shunaiman: The future?! So that's what they meant.... And what of my rule? Am I remembered favourably? Is the empire still inta... no. How is not the time! We will save talking for later; now we must fight to guarantee we can still draw breath by the evening's close. Einhasad's own angel, Anakim, leads my forces against Lilith, Shilen's daughter. This is war of absolute horror, of field after field stained red with the blood of Aden's people. Yet I can see no immediate resolution...I fear that when the dust of this great conflict has settled, the victor will have naught to rule over but ruined lands and a broken people. That is why I sought to activate the seal. But even then my path was blocked. The men I sent were each butchered, and now even I have been wounded. But you... will you help?
